story_arceus_03_06000/2401_1001_0200_10:
N and his six Pokémon will be the challengers in
this Arceus Cup!
story_arceus_03_06000/2401_1001_0300_10:
They’ll be battling the Unova Elite Four and the
reigning Champion, Iris, in a knockout-style
tournament!
story_arceus_03_06000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Now’s the time to show Arceus how bright your
bonds shine!
